virtual void DzDistantLight::aimAt ( const DzVec3 &  pos  )  [inline, virtual]

Rotates the camera and adjusts its focal distance so that its focal point is at the given point.

Parameters:
pos The point to aim the camera at.

virtual void DzDistantLight::frame ( const DzBox3 &  box,
float  aspect 
) [inline, virtual]

Translates the camera so that its view frames the given box, and sets the camera's focal point to the center of the box, given the aspect ratio of the current view (w / h)

Parameters:
box The bounding box to frame in the camera's view
aspect The aspect ratio of the current view.

Reimplemented from DzLight.

void DzDistantLight::setGL ( int  width,
int  height,
const QRect &  view,
int  pass = 0,
int  totalPasses = 1,
bool  depthOfField = false 
) [virtual]

Sets the projection for viewing from the perspective of the light in OpenGL

Parameters:
width The width of the viewport
height The height of the viewport
view The rectangle defining the area displayed in the viewport
pass The current rendering pass in multipass operations
totalPasses The total number of passes for the rendering operation
depthOfField Whether or not to perform depth of field calculations

Implements DzCamera.

void DzDistantLight::setGLShadow ( int  pass,
int  totalPasses,
int *  shadowMapSize = NULL 
) [virtual]

Sets up the light for rendering to a shadow map in OpenGL

Parameters:
pass If the light is an area light and needs to be jittered during a multi-pass render, this is the index of the current pass.
totalPasses For area lights, this is the total number of jitter passes that will be
shadowMapSize A pointer to an integer that will be set to the size of the shadowmap that is generated by this light.

Implements DzLight.

Reimplemented in DzPointLight.
